original_text: They will live there safely. They will build houses and they will plant vineyards. I will punish all the nations around them who have insulted them. Then my people will live safely in their homes. And they will know that I am the Lord their God.” ’ 28: They will live there safely. They will build houses and they will plant vineyards. I will punish all the nations around them who have insulted them. Then my people will live safely in their homes. And they will know that I am the Lord their God.” ’ 28: They will live there safely. They will build houses and they will plant vineyards. I will punish all the nations around them who have insulted them. Then my people will live safely in their homes. And they will know that I am the Lord their God.” ’
korean_text: 그들이 그 가운데에 평안히 살면서 집을 건축하며 포도원을 만들고 그들의 사방에서 멸시하던 모든 자를 내가 심판할 때에 그들이 평안히 살며 내가 그 하나님 여호와인 줄을 그들이 알리라

sentences.original_text: I will punish all the nations around them
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들을 둘러싼 모든 민족을 벌할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Then my people will live safely
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내 백성은 안전하게 살 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that I am the Lord their God
